text: Fritz Sauer (born 1872, date of death unknown) was a German gymnast. He competed in the men's individual all-around event at the 1900 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1872 births Category:Year of death missing Category:German male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of Germany Category:Gymnasts at the 1900 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing
title: Fritz Sauer
